mixdb

Class SimpleDBSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • mixdb.SimpleDBSearcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DBSearcher
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MixDBSearcher

    public class SimpleDBSearcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements DBSearcher
    An implementation of the DBSearcher interface that aim at searching single-peptide per query spectrum (as oppotion to MixDBSearcher which search multi-peptide matches to a query spectrum).
    Author:
    Jian Wang
